verses.ar: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَنۡ أَنذِرۡ قَوۡمَكَ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
verses.en: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment

verses.ar: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ
verses.en: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner

verses.ar: أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.en: [Saying], 'Worship Allah, fear Him and obey me

verses.ar: يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُؤَخِّرۡكُمۡ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمًّىۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُۚ لَوۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.en: Allah will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] Allah, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew

verses.ar: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا
verses.en: He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day

verses.ar: فَلَمۡ يَزِدۡهُمۡ دُعَآءِيٓ إِلَّا فِرَارٗا
verses.en: But my invitation increased them not except in flight

verses.ar: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ لِتَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ جَعَلُوٓاْ أَصَٰبِعَهُمۡ فِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَٱسۡتَغۡشَوۡاْ ثِيَابَهُمۡ وَأَصَرُّواْ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ ٱسۡتِكۡبَارٗا
verses.en: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance

verses.ar: ثُمَّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ جِهَارٗا
verses.en: Then I invited them publicly

verses.ar: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا
verses.en: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly

verses.ar: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا
verses.en: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver

verses.ar: يُرۡسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّدۡرَارٗا
verses.en: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers

verses.ar: وَيُمۡدِدۡكُم بِأَمۡوَٰلٖ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٖ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ أَنۡهَٰرٗا
verses.en: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers

verses.ar: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارٗا
verses.en: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur

verses.ar: وَقَدۡ خَلَقَكُمۡ أَطۡوَارًا
verses.en: While He has created you in stages

verses.ar: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗا
verses.en: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers

verses.ar: وَجَعَلَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ سِرَاجٗا
verses.en: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp

verses.ar: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ نَبَاتٗا
verses.en: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth

verses.ar: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمۡ فِيهَا وَيُخۡرِجُكُمۡ إِخۡرَاجٗا
verses.en: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction

verses.ar: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِسَاطٗا
verses.en: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse

verses.ar: لِّتَسۡلُكُواْ مِنۡهَا سُبُلٗا فِجَاجٗا
verses.en: That you may follow therein roads of passage

verses.ar: قَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِي وَٱتَّبَعُواْ مَن لَّمۡ يَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا
verses.en: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss

verses.ar: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا كُبَّارٗا
verses.en: And they conspired an immense conspiracy

verses.ar: وَقَالُواْ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدّٗا وَلَا سُوَاعٗا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسۡرٗا
verses.en: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr

verses.ar: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّواْ كَثِيرٗاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلٗا
verses.en: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error

verses.ar: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٰٔتِهِمۡ أُغۡرِقُواْ فَأُدۡخِلُواْ نَارٗا فَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارٗا
verses.en: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers

verses.ar: وَقَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
verses.en: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant

verses.ar: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرۡهُمۡ يُضِلُّواْ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓاْ إِلَّا فَاجِرٗا كَفَّارٗا
verses.en: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever

verses.ar: رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيۡتِيَ مُؤۡمِنٗا وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارَۢا
verses.en: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction
